Class NewLogForEachRunFileAppender

              com.diyfever.gui.miscutils.NewLogForEachRunFileAppender
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.log4j.Appender, org.apache.log4j.spi.OptionHandler
public class NewLogForEachRunFileAppender
extends org.apache.log4j.FileAppender

This is a customized log4j appender, which will create a new file for every run of the application.
